ygData.subject: RE: Lighstones was Re: Elf Hide Gloves
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If they weren t no-drop, they d be functionally equivalent to normal lightstones except you can t sell them.  I believe they re no-rent as well. I suspect
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 7 Oct 1999, Blair, Keith (Keith Blair) wrote:
>
> Now if only someone could come up with a good reason as to
> why Burned Out Lightstones are NO DROP I'd be a bit happier.
> The normal and greater lightstones aren't NO DROP, so why
> the useless burned out ones?

If they weren't no-drop, they'd be functionally equivalent to
normal lightstones except you can't sell them. I believe
they're no-rent as well. I suspect Verant just wanted them to
disappear when the wisp was killed, but couldn't figure out a
quick way to code that, so settled for making them no-drop
no-rent.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
